senses.sense_definition: A pile of wood or other material used for burning a dead body during a funeral ceremony.

examples.text: The villagers built a funeral <w>pyre</w> to honor their dead.
They placed the warrior's body on the <w>pyre</w> before lighting the fire.

senses.sense_definition: A large pile of combustible material, especially one that is burning or intended to be burned.

examples.text: Flames rose high from the <w>pyre</w> in the night sky.
The huge <w>pyre</w> of dry branches burned for several hours.
